channel.title: CVE Feed for IVM Development Group -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IVM Development Group -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-23554|2024-08-02T10:35:33.199Z -- ivm%20development%20group -- pg_ivm
item.description: Uncontrolled search path element vulnerability exists in pg_ivm versions prior to 1.5.1. When refreshing an IMMV, pg_ivm executes functions without specifying schema names. Under certain conditions, pg_ivm may be tricked to execute unexpected functions from other schemas with the IMMV owner's privilege. If this vulnerability is exploited, an unexpected function provided by an attacker may be executed with the privilege of the materialized view owner.

item.title: CVE-2023-22847|2024-08-02T10:20:31.077Z -- ivm%20development%20group -- pg_ivm
item.description: Information disclosure vulnerability exists in pg_ivm versions prior to 1.5.1. An Incrementally Maintainable Materialized View (IMMV) created by pg_ivm may reflect rows with Row-Level Security that the owner of the IMMV should not have access to. As a result, information in tables protected by Row-Level Security may be retrieved by a user who is not authorized to access it.
